items.label: I naturally take charge when situations become unclear or uncertain.
I enjoy meeting new people and building connections.
I am patient and steady when handling tasks.
I focus on doing things the right way every time.
I am highly competitive and driven to achieve measurable results.
I bring energy and positivity to group settings.
I am supportive and considerate of others' feelings.
I am cautious and prefer to analyze all details before acting.
I prefer to make quick decisions and move forward rapidly.
I am enthusiastic and talkative in most social settings.
I remain calm and reliable, even under pressure.
I prefer to follow established rules and proven systems.
I am comfortable taking significant risks to achieve big wins.
I value social recognition and being well-liked by others.
I am loyal and dependable to my team members.
I value accuracy and pay close attention to detail.
I actively challenge others to perform at their best.
I can persuade people easily and influence their decisions.
I avoid conflict and confrontation whenever possible.
I prefer to plan thoroughly and prepare before taking action.
I am comfortable giving direct, tough feedback when necessary.
I am spontaneous and enjoy new adventures and experiences.
I prefer a stable and predictable work environment.
I am precise and regularly double-check my work for errors.
I am primarily motivated by winning and achieving goals.
I am motivated by building relationships and social interaction.
I am motivated by maintaining stability and harmony.
I am motivated by achieving correctness and following structure.
I immediately take charge when others are hesitating.
I get excited about sharing new ideas and stories with others.
I listen carefully to others before expressing my own views.
I carefully review all instructions before starting any task.
I am assertive and direct when pursuing what I want.
I love inspiring and energizing groups of people.
I am dependable and consistently keep my commitments.
I am disciplined and highly organized in my approach to work.
I want control over how things are done and executed.
I want freedom and enjoyment in whatever I do.
I want peace and predictability in my environment.
I want things done according to established standards.
I communicate directly and get straight to the point.
I communicate with enthusiasm and expressiveness.
I communicate calmly and listen more than I speak.
I communicate precisely with well-thought-out points.
In conflicts, I confront issues head-on to resolve them quickly.
In conflicts, I try to smooth things over and maintain relationships.
In conflicts, I seek compromise and avoid escalation.
In conflicts, I analyze the situation logically before responding.
I prefer to work independently and make my own decisions.
I prefer to work in collaborative, social team environments.
I prefer to work in supportive, harmonious team settings.
I prefer to work with clear guidelines and quality standards.
Under pressure, I become more focused and decisive.
Under pressure, I rally others and maintain optimism.
Under pressure, I remain steady and supportive of the team.
Under pressure, I analyze carefully and proceed cautiously.
I thrive in fast-paced, challenging environments with clear targets.
I thrive in dynamic, people-focused environments with variety.
I thrive in consistent, supportive environments with clear expectations.
I thrive in structured, detail-oriented environments with high standards.
